data.event: On 30 January 2012, the Syrian Army gained control over the city after the Battle of Douma, a major operation against the opposition armed groups in Rif Dimashq Governorate.
On 29 June 2012, Syrian Army is accused of committing a massacre in Douma, where more than 50 people where killed.

event.title: 2015 Douma market massacre, the city was attacked

data.event: In the 2015 Douma market massacre, the city was attacked by Syrian Army ground-to-ground missiles, leaving at least 50 dead and several more missing.
